==Chinese==

===Etymology===
Literally: "not too." A [[slang]] expression peculiar to Southern China, particularly [[Jiangsu]], [[Shanghai]].

===Pronunciation===

|m=不yàotài
|cat=adv
}}

#: [[老師]][[不要太]][[嚴格]]。 (''[[Traditional Chinese|trad.]]'')
#:: ''The teacher is '''very''' strict!''
